page.title: 05WASTE DISPOSAL
page.content: There are two ditches on the {NORTH and{EAST}sides of{CLEANAWAY.}ON the other two sides there are{SEAWALLS. One ditch is collecting the leachate and the water. One is to see the difference in the water.{LEACHATE}is a{LIQUID}and out of that there is a {GAS}called{AMMONIA.}The ammonia is getting into the river and killing the fish. The are trying to stop it getting into the river with a pump from the ditch into the lake. A pump then sprays it into the air and onto the ground and it evaporates. The ammonia gas is dangerous to the fish. The people are not satisfied with this way of disposing of the liquid leachate because the sprayer keeps breaking down. They are working on a new{MACHINE}to encourage{MICROBES}to eat the ammonia. So that the water can run straight out into fields & creeks.
